test.name: Check reltead video play or not
Verify Banner is visible or not
Verify subscription button is visible or not
verify that without login subscription button is visible
check after login subscription button is visile
Verify user already buy a subscription or not
check if user already buy a subscription so popup is visible or not
Verify the url
Verify the current page source
Verify total number of videos in Homepage
verify the Applestrore button is redirect or not
verify the playstore button is redirect or not
verify that the coupon code with the price
verify that the coupon with the percentage
Verify that coupon code enter
verify that if user enter the Invalid data in the searchfield
verify that without login if user click on the watchnow so redirect into login
